0.8.name: wordpress/contact-form-7-group-mail
0.8.description: Contact Form 7 Group Mail allows you to send messages to multiple users, according to their groups. With this plugin you can choose which groups (admins, editors, authors, contributors, subscribers and custom roles) are going to receive the e-mails. The list of recipients is automatically updated, so you don't need to change the contact form every time a user is added or removed. Important: it is an extension for Contact Form 7 plugin.
